: What you bring to my face every day
Today I've been thinking about all our
memories together. Remember our first date?
Where you came in jeans, and
, and crocs, I absolutely loved it, and I always will.
Or if we go with the gurudwara date, for the first time, you help my arm, and I saw how ‚Äúfast‚Äù you eat, and I knew how much extra I will have to eat on our dates. :P

Every moment with you is a treasure I
And we will create more today, with lots of your friends/knowns around
Nothing compares to your smile, and nothing ever will.
They say absence makes the heart grow fonder, and I'm living proof of that. Every day apart makes me appreciate you even more
, also miss you even harder, and deeper, even though we are connected with
or video calls, nothing compares to holding you
I can hold you in my arms again
, I am sure you are too
. Until then, know that you're always on my mind and forever in my heart.
There is a lot that I love about you but l
et me tell you what I love about you
that brightens my darkest days, your kindness
that touches everyone around you, and your strength that inspires me daily.
I just want to remind you that,
I'll love you in a week.
I'll love you in a month.
I'll love you in a year.
I'll love you in a decade. And I'll love you in the next life.
No matter how far time stretches, whatever your idea of forever is, I'll love you past the edge of it.
You are my sunshine, my anchor, and my best friend all rolled into one amazing person.
I'll text you & I'll always care for you & annoy you all the time, so stop telling me that I should not worry about you
t stop it because if there

t be happy when you don
t talk to me or ignore me or when you are heartbroken,
even if you say "You're fine" I know you are not because there
s always a part of me that worries about you even when on days we fight or don
I'll never forget you, I'll never replace you because you're my happiness &
'm not just in love with you, I'm in love with everything we are together.

The way we understand each other, the way we laugh without trying, the way we just fit. Being with you feels like home, like peace, like something I never want to let go of. Every little moment every glance, every touch, every late-night conversation makes my heart even more certain...
With you, life feels lighter, love feels deeper, and the future feels like a beautiful promise. I'm endlessly grateful for everything we are, and for everything we're becoming!
You are my dream come true.
I am in love with you. Nothing is ever going to change
that. You are the most important thing in my life
. I love everything about you from the way you smile and giggle when I do something stupid, to listening to you talk about
way that I can truly repay you for being the greatest
person in my life. I couldn't stop thinking about you all day
ke up thinking about you. As I
It makes me realize how close we are, and how great things will be when we can be together
. I do my best to try and keep you happy about us being apar
. And it's hard. I really hate being away from you
, and I know you do to

. It takes a lot of concentration for me to try and actually be with other people instead of thinking about you. It's really crazy for me. I never knew what it was really like to be in love, and I never knew you could love someone as much as this.
It's hard trying to be optimistic about things when

. I want to be with you forever, and don't want to have to go through this again. But I know that we will, and it's painful to think about. I feel like us being apart has brought us closer together. It's made us realize how much we need each other. I always want to be by your side, and it's difficult to be me without you.
more than I ever dreamed possible
Some days it just hits me how much I miss you.
I go through my routine, talk to people,
but there's always that part of me that's waiting for you.
I miss your hands, your laugh, your voice calling me "baby" like it's the softest thing in the world.
I miss hearing your voice in real time, not just through messages.
I still want you just as much as I did on day one.
Sometimes I count the days just
o feel closer to you. Loving you from a distance
, even when it is not too much,
has taught me patience, strength, and the kind of love that doesn't fade when things get hard.
I'll wait, as long as it takes
I can't wait to see you and hold you close.
